full_output.summary: As a Computer Science Engineering graduate, I am seeking a position where I can leverage my problem- solving skills and apply my knowledge in a practical setting. With a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for exploring innovative solutions to complex problems, I am eager to contribute to a dynamic team and learn from experienced professionals in the industry.

projects.name: Weather-App
projects.description: This weather app lets users search for city weather and displays current conditions with temperature and details. It fetches data from OpenWeatherMap and updates the UI with relevant weather icons and animations. Error handling is included to manage invalid locations.

projects.name: Video Conferencing Website
projects.description: Developed a real-time video conferencing application using modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, and GetStream.io. Implemented features for seamless video communication, and secure user authentication using Clerk.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website featuring a fixed, animated navbar and dynamic content sections with smooth transitions. It includes interactive elements using FontAwesome icons and emphasizes visual engagement with hover effects and animations.

experiences.description: Participated in a virtual internship program offered by APSSDC specializing in Data Analysis.Completed a hands-on project that enhanced skills in data manipulation, visualization, and problem-solving. This inaugural experience has laid a solid groundwork for my future career aspirations.

full_output.name: Sushma Kalam
